name: In Hope Of Peace
description:
Crownfell is a land of sick burns and heartmelting compliments. But in the shadow of war, only the beautiful words can pass. Become a messenger and secure the peace.

CONTROLS: LEFT ARROW / RIGHT ARROW

Your goal is to reach 100% on both the meters.
Lords will lose patience if they don't get any letters for some time.
Tip: the lords have different writing styles, you can use that to your advantage.

Made for Mini Jam 34: Balance, with the limitation being "Two button controls"

Music: "Dreams of Home" by RawGreen
